title: Before and After -DAn Ã¶nce â€¦-DAn sonra
desc: Learn about before and after in Turkish

body.raw: ## Before and After -DAn Ã¶nce â€¦-DAn sonra --- We often prioritize things when more than one thing demands our attention at the same time. In this article we will learn about sequencing activities using **before** and **after** in Turkish. ðŸ”– Ã¶nce â†’ before or first ðŸ”– sonra â†’ after or then | Last Vowel | Last Letter | before / after | | --- | --- | --- | | a-Ä±-o-u | one of [ f, s, t, k, Ã§, ÅŸ, h, p ] | -**tan** Ã¶nce / -**tan** sonra | | a-Ä±-o-u | one of [ other letters ] | -**dan** Ã¶nce / -**dan** sonra | | e-i-Ã¶-Ã¼ | one of [ f, s, t, k, Ã§, ÅŸ, h, p ] | -**ten** Ã¶nce / -**ten** sonra | | e-i-Ã¶-Ã¼ | one of [ other letters ] | -**den** Ã¶nce / -**den** sonra | Examples She reads book **before** going to bed. - Uyumadan **Ã¶nce** kitap okuyor. He drinks coffee **after** waking up. - UyandÄ±ktan **sonra** kahve iÃ§iyor. Mert took his wallet **before** going to the market. - Mert markete gitmeden **Ã¶nce** cÃ¼zdanÄ±nÄ± aldÄ±. Ashley made a plan **before** traveling to Europe. - Ashley Avrupa'ya seyahat etmeden **Ã¶nce** bir plan yaptÄ±. I will call you **after** I finish my work. - Ä°ÅŸimi bitirdikten **sonra** seni arayacaÄŸÄ±m. Mehmet will meet with his friend **first** and **then** he will go to the cinema. - Mehmet **Ã¶nce** arkadaÅŸÄ±yla buluÅŸacak ve **sonra** sinemaya gidecek. John sold his car **first** and **then** travelled around the world. - John **Ã¶nce** arabasÄ±nÄ± sattÄ± ve **sonra** dÃ¼nyayÄ± dolaÅŸtÄ±. --- Thanks for reading!
